data.text: Don't let anything stop you from travelling this summer. Here's something that will make you pack your bags right away. #SpiceJet presents the ‘#FLYAWAYSALE’.  Now book your domestic flights at unbelievable fare starting at just Rs.2492/- (all-inclusive). https://t.co/PykmFjYcix https://t.co/NGfq5Xv1Gy

A legend, an inspiration.
It was a great pleasure to fly Swami Sivananda, the #PadmaShree Awardee 2022.
His dedication and discipline truly blew us away and his life continues to be an inspiration for all.
We thank him for choosing to fly with us.
#SpiceJet #FlySpiceJet https://t.co/HEpfByLxfp

Avani Singh, the CEO of SpiceHealth, is the winner of the prestigious Young Woman Entrepreneur of the Year (under 30) Award 2022 by Business World. Follow @avaniisingh to keep abreast of accessible and affordable healthcare and diagnostics by @spice_health . https://t.co/Ynji5DYha5
